--- In gladiator@y..., <Zardus@n...> wrote:
> On Sat, 7 Sep 2002, dph_of_rules wrote:
> 
> > This is wierd: I found 4 files which didn't give me correct 
values,
> > but lots more that did work right.  :/
> >
> > Oh well, I'll let it be.
> 
> Try running the pixieread utility (openglad/util/pixieread.c) and 
see what it tells you. If it tells you incorrect values, then it might 
be the files. What levels are these?

1)I would compile and run it except for one big thing: I don't have 
the SDL.h file on my own computer.  Either that file didn't come with 
Microsoft Visual Studio, or somehow I overlooked it when installing 
Microsoft Visual Studio (unlikely, since I deliberately choose to 
install almost everything).

scen150 and scen116 out of my set didn't.

For most scenarios, it seems to work.  

Right now, I'm going to work on adding generators and player startup 
positions to the list of things to put on the map as well putting some 
validation rules on those text boxes.

I am going to try to have a version completely functional (not 
necessarily very user friendly nor loaded with all the features I want 
to add) to send to you in a zip file pretty soon when I clear up some 
redundacies.
